QuestData.Title: Assaulting the Haglands
QuestData.Description: Proceed on foot into the Haglands and slay any harpies you find.$b$bQuell their numbers!$b$bWe will provide air support and force your prey to the ground where you can deal with them.$b$bShow these witches the fury of your... well... your "you."
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Crawliac Harpies and $2oa Skywhisker Loyalists in the Haglands.
QuestData.CompletionText: It has been many years since we have had to enter the Haglands in force.
QuestData.RewardText: Haha! You are covered in the feathers of your enemies.
